title: Anti-ICE Protesters Have Started a Month-Long Tech and AI Boycott. Here’s How It Works
full_text: Anti-ICE Protesters Have Started a Month-Long Tech and AI Boycott. Here’s How It Works. Protesters are cancelling subscriptions from ten major tech and AI companies.. Only days after a nationwide general strike to protest the Trump administration’s brutal immigration crackdown, a new group is now embarking on a longer coordinated economic strike, this time targeti… [+5243 chars]
